member.name: T:VBScripting.FileChooser
member.summary: Provides a file chooser dialog for VBScript.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.FileName
member.summary:
Opens a dialog enabling the user to browse for and choose a file.
Returns the filespec of the chosen file. Returns an empty string if the user cancels.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.FileNames
member.summary:
Opens a dialog enabling the user to browse for and choose multiple files.
Returns a string array of filespecs. Returns an empty array if the user cancels.
Requires Multiselect to have been set to True.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.FileNamesString
member.summary:
Opens a dialog enabling the user to browse for and choose multiple files.
Returns a delimited string of filespecs ( delimited by | ). Returns an empty string if the user cancels.
Requires Multiselect to have been set to True.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.Filter
member.summary:
Gets or sets the selectable file types. The default is "All files (*.*)|*.*"
Example #1: fc.Filter = "Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|All files (*.*)|*.*" Example #2: fc.Filter = "Image Files(*.BMP;*.JPG;*.GIF)|*.BMP;*.JPG;*.GIF|All files (*.*)|*.*"

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.FilterIndex
member.summary:
Gets or sets the index controlling which filter item is initially selected.
An integer. The index is 1-based. The default is 1.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.Title
member.summary:
Gets or sets the dialog titlebar text.
The default text is "Browse for a file."

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.Multiselect
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether multiple files can be selected.
A boolean. The default is False.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.DereferenceLinks
member.summary:
Indicates whether the returned file is the referenced file or the .lnk file itself.
Gets or sets, if the selected file is a .lnk file, whether the filespec returned refers to the .lnk file itself (False) or to the file that the .lnk file points to (True).
A boolean. The default is False.
member.remarks: The default of the wrapped property, OpenFileDialog.DereferenceLinks, is True.

member.name: P:VBScripting.FileChooser.DefaultExt
member.summary:
Gets or sets the file extension name that is automatically supplied when one is not specified.
A string. The default is "txt".
